simbio.se.sau.view.list

Class AbstractAdapter<T extends IAbstractModel>

  • java.lang.Object
      • simbio.se.sau.view.list.AbstractAdapter<T>

  • public class AbstractAdapter<T extends IAbstractModel>
extends
    This class is a abstract implementation of ArrayAdapter to do more easy customizations to ListView Adapter.
    Author:
    Ademar Alves de Oliveira ademar111190@gmail.com
